justification: Minimal ToM. It notes B’s depth gain but ignores B’s conservative, consensus-driven preferences and injury caution. A’s rationale mislabels Lucas Allen (Out, Tier 5, declining) as a steady floor, conflicting with A’s urgent need for wins and floor preference. B already has a TE4; Ethan Turner (TE4, inconsistent) and a Tier 5 RB don’t align with B’s floor/value priorities. The offer is feasible but poorly justified and mismatched to both managers’ stated profiles.
